text: Neoterebra sterigmoides is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Neoterebra sterigmoides (Simone & Gracia, 2006). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at: http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=1416763 on 2020-01-27 ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== ==External links== * Simone, L. title: Neoterebra sterigmoides
